blog.title: Gooogle Summer of Code with Linkerd
blog.description: A brief write-up about the work I did as a part of GSoC '20 with Linkerd.

blog.title: An Introduction to Docker for Novices
blog.description: A short and beginner friendly article about docker and containers explaining the basic concepts with a very simple practical example

blog.title: Docker Security: Backdooring Images
blog.description: A very simple tutorial explaining how we can exploit Docker images by backdooring them using Dockerscan

blog.title: Feature Selection for Machine Learning
blog.description: A tutorial on how we can use Backward elemination to optimize Machine learning algorithms.

blog.title: Boilerplate code generation for Node.js
blog.description: A article demonstrating an open source npm module I developed during my free time - NodeBoiler

projects.title: Simulation Federated Learning with Docker and gRPC
projects.description: A simulation of Federated learning using Docker and gRPC. Developed for CSE4001 - Parallel and Distributed Computing course at VIT Vellore.

projects.title: Chatbot for 'Evento'
projects.description: A Deep Learing based 'Question-Answering'chatbot system built for 'Evento' - an event organizing platform developed by the students at @IEEE VIT Vellore.

projects.title: Deep Learning for Music Composition
projects.description: A web application that uses Deep Learning in the backend to generate song lyrics like Maroon 5.

projects.title: Named-Entity Recognition
projects.description: A NER model trained from scratch on a Bi-LSTM Architecture (using Keras) on a Kaggle dataset.

projects.title: Node Boiler
projects.description: A simple and flexible plug-and-play CLI tool that can automate boilplate code generation for your next RESTful API built with NodeJS.

projects.title: Predicting Product ratings
projects.description: Implementation of sentiment analysis on amazon product reviews to predict product ratings.
